LanguageData.ZP_ElectricThreshingMachine.label: 電動脱穀機
LanguageData.ZP_ElectricThreshingMachine.description: 【役割：脱穀】\n稲穂を脱穀して米(籾)を生産する農具。電動でやるため効率はかなり良い。
LanguageData.ZP_ElectricThreshingMachine_Frame.label: 電動脱穀機 (building)
LanguageData.ZP_ElectricThreshingMachine_Frame.descri: 【役割：脱穀】\n稲穂を脱穀して米(籾)を生産する農具。電動でやるため効率はかなり良い。
LanguageData.ZP_RiceMillingMachine.label: Rice milling machine
LanguageData.ZP_RiceMillingMachine.description: (Role: Separating/Polishing)\nA machine that converts Brown rice to White rice.\nOutput suffers due to the machine's manual labor requirements.
LanguageData.ZP_RiceMillingMachine_Blueprint.label: Rice milling machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_RiceMillingMachine_Frame.label: Rice milling machine (building)
LanguageData.ZP_RiceMillingMachine_Frame.description: (Role: Separating/Polishing)\nA machine that converts Brown rice to White rice.\nOutput suffers due to the machine's manual labor requirements.
LanguageData.ZP_ThreshingRiceMillingMachine.label: Auto-Miller 3000
LanguageData.ZP_ThreshingRiceMillingMachine.descripti: (Role: Threshing/Separating/Polishing)\nA machine that converts Inaho directly into White rice.
LanguageData.ZP_ThreshingRiceMillingMachine_Frame.des: (Role: Threshing/Separating/Polishing)\nA machine that converts Inaho directly into White rice.
